name: Doodle Stunts
description:
Drive your car along a randomly generated road and perform stunts for points.

Draw your own road  to help your vehicle get over the obstacles.

Unlock more vehicles and upgrades.

This game contains adverts.

Key Features:

     Hand drawn cars.

     Draw your own road.

     Exciting adverts you can watch, skip or turn off.

[Windows Version]

No adverts to watch so you can only swap points for upgrades.
